constellations.description: Quando Devastação: Obliteração é lançada na Posição Corpo-a-Corpo, o Tempo de Recarga de Legado do Mal - Ondas de Fúria termina imediatamente. Esse efeito só acontecerá quando Tartaglia retornar à sua Posição à Distancia.

characters.name: Traveler (Anemo)
characters.description: Um viajante de outro mundo que teve sua ente querida levada e foi forçado a embarcar em uma jornada em busca dos sete

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Palm Vortex
skills.description: Grasping the wind’s might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to enemies in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.

abilities.description: DMG and AoE will gradually increase
If the vortex comes in contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

skills.title: Gust Surge
skills.description: Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.

abilities.description: If the tornado comes in contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.title: Slitting Wind
passives.description: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.

passives.title: Second Wind
passives.description: Palm Vortex kills renegerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.title: Vórtice da Fúria
constellations.description: A Palma da Vórtice puxa os inimigos e objetos dentro de um raio de 5 metros.

constellations.title: Turbilhão da Revolta
constellations.description: Aumenta a Recarga da Energia em 16%.

constellations.title: Rajada Arrebatadora
constellations.description: Aumenta o nível das Ondas de Rajadas em 3. O nível de elevação é 15.

constellations.title: Brisa Protetora
constellations.description: Reduz o Dano recebido enquanto lança a Vórtice da Palma em 10%.

constellations.title: Vórtice Stellaris
constellations.description: Aumenta o nível do Vórtice da Palma em 3. O nível de elevação é 15.

constellations.title: Ventos Entrelaçados
constellations.description: Os alvos que recebem Dano de Ondas de Rajadas possuem sua RES Anemo reduzido em 20%. Se ocorrer uma Absorção ELementa, então sua RES do Elemento correspondente tamém diminuirá 20%.

characters.name: Traveler (Geo)
characters.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Starfell Sword
skills.description: You disgorge a meteorite from the depths of the earth, dealing AoE Geo DMG. The meteorite is considered a Geo Construct, and can be climbed or used to block attacks.

abilities.description: The skill’s positioning may be adjusted.

skills.title: Wake of Earth
skills.description: Energizing the Geo elements deep underground, you set off expanding shockwaves. Launches surrounding enemies back and deals AoE Geo DMG. A stone wall is erected at the edges of the shockwave. The stone wall is considered a Geo Construct, and may be used to block attacks.

passives.title: Shattered Darkrock
passives.description: Reduces Starfell Sword’s CD by 2s.

passives.title: Frenzied Rockslide
passives.description: The final hit of a Normal Attack combo triggers a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as AoE Geo DMG.

constellations.title: Invincible Stonewall
constellations.description: Allies within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

constellations.title: Rockcore Meltdown
constellations.description: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

constellations.title: Will of the Rock
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Wake of Earth by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Reaction Force
constellations.description: The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every enemy hit. A maximum of 25 Energy can be recovered in this manner at any one time.

constellations.title: Meteorite Impact
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Starfell Sword by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Everlasting Boulder
constellations.description: The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer. The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.

characters.name: Venti
characters.description: Um dos muitos bardos de Mondstadt, que vagueia livremente pelas ruas e becos da cidade.

abilities.description: Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged arrow will deal Anemo DMG.
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Skyward Sonnet
skills.description: O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky!

abilities.description: Summons a Wind Domain at the enemy’s location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching enemies into the air.

Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected enemies into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air. Enemies hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.

skills.title: Wind’s Grand Ode
skills.description: Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in objects and enemies along its path, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.

abilities.description: If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.title: Windrider
passives.description: Decreases all party member’s gliding Stamina Consumption by 20%.

passives.title: Embrace of Winds
passives.description: Holding Skyward Sonnet creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

passives.title: Stormeye
passives.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of Wind’s Grand Ode end. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element.

constellations.title: Splitting Gale
constellations.description: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow’s DMG.

constellations.title: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.description: Skyward Sonnet decreases enemy Anemo RES by 12% for 10s. Enemies launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

constellations.title: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Wind’s Grand Ode by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.description: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

constellations.title: Concierto dal Cielo
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Skyward Sonnet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Storm of Defiance
constellations.description: Targets who take DMG from Wind’s Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

characters.name: Xiangling
characters.description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She’s extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Guoba Attack
skills.description: Summons Guoba the Panda. Guoba continuously breathes fire, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

skills.title: Pyronado
skills.description: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for so long as the ability persists, dealing Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path.

passives.title: Chef de Cuisine
passives.description: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

passives.title: Crossfire
passives.description: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

passives.title: Beware, It’s Super Hot!
passives.description: When Guoba Attack’s effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

constellations.title: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.description: Enemies hit by Guoba’s attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.title: Oil Meets Fire
constellations.description: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the enemy for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling’s ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

constellations.title: Deepfry
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Slowbake
constellations.description: Pyronado’s duration is increased by 40%.

constellations.title: Guoba Mad
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Guoba Attack by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Condensed Pyronado
constellations.description: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.

characters.name: Xiao
characters.description: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" or "Vigilant Yaksha."

abilities.description: Perform up to 6 rapid strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
Xiao does not take DMG from performing Plunging Attacks.

skills.title: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
skills.description:
Xiao lunges forward, dealing Anemo DMG to opponents in his path.
Can be used in mid-air.
Starts with 2 charges.

skills.title: Bane of All Evil
skills.description: Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago.

abilities.description: Yaksha's Mask
descriptions: Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability.
Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG.
Converts attack DMG into Anemo DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP.
The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field.

passives.title: Transcension: Gravity Defier
passives.description:
Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons
passives.description:
While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists.
The maximum DMG Bonus is 25%.

passives.title: Dissolution Eon: Heaven Fall
passives.description:
Using Lemniscatic Wind Cycling increases the DMG of subsequent uses of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 15%.
 This effect lasts for 7s, and has a maximum of 3 stacks. Gaining a new stack refreshes the effect's duration.

constellations.title: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
constellations.description: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling’s charges by 1.

constellations.title: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
constellations.description: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

constellations.title: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
constellations.description: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

constellations.title: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Bane of All Evil by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
constellations.description: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.

characters.name: Xingqiu
characters.description: Um jovem carregando uma espada longa que frequentemente visto em estantes de livros. Ele tem um coração de ouro e anseia por justiça e equidade para todos.

abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunges from mid-aur to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen
skills.description: Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit the character. 20% of Xingqiu’s Hydro DMG Bonus will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords. The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%. The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3. Using this ability applies the Wet status onto the character.

abilities.description: The Rain Swords have the following properties:
descriptions: When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
Increases the character’s resistance to interruption.

skills.title: Guhua Sword - Raincutter
skills.description: Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords.

abilities.name: Rainbow Bladework
abilities.description: These effects carry over to other characters.
descriptions: Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG.
Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability’s duration.

passives.title: Flash of Genius
passives.description: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

passives.title: Hydropathic
passives.description: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character’s HP based on 6% of Xingqiu’s Max HP.

passives.title: Blades Amidst Raindrops
passives.description: Xingqiu gains a 20% Hydro DMG Bonus.

constellations.title: The Scent Remained
constellations.description: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

constellations.title: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
constellations.description: Extends the duration of Guhua Sword - Raincutter by 3s. Decreases the Hydro RES of enemies hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

constellations.title: Weaver of Verses
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword - Raincutter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Evilsoother
constellations.description: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.

constellations.title: Embrace of Rain
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.description: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword - Raincutter’s sword rain attacks greatly increases the DMG of the third. Xingqiu regenerates 3 Energy when sword rain attacks hit enemies.

characters.name: Xinyan
characters.description: A única roqueira do Porto de Liyue, ela usa sua música e canções apaixonadas para resistir aos preconceitos.

abilities.description: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby enemies. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Sweeping Fervor
skills.description: Xinyan brandishes her instrument, dealing Pyro DMG on nearby enemies, forming a shield made out of her audience’s passion.

abilities.description: The shield’s DMG Absorption scales based on Xinyan’s DEF and on the number of enemies hit:
descriptions: Hitting 0-1 enemies grants Shield Level 1: Ad Lib.
Hitting 2 enemies grants Shield Level 2: Lead-In.
Hitting 3 or more enemies grants Shield Level 3: Rave, which will also deal intermittent Pyro DMG to nearby enemies.

abilities.description: The shield has the following special properties:
descriptions: When unleashed, it infuses Xinyan with Pyro.
It has 250% DMG Absorption effectiveness against Pyro DMG.

skills.title: Riff Revolution
skills.description: Strumming rapidly, Xinyan launches nearby enemies and deals Physical DMG to them, hyping up the crowd. The sheer intensity of the atmosphere will cause explosions that deal Pyro DMG to nearby enemies.

passives.title: A Rad Recipe
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on an DEF-boosting dish, Xinyan has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passives.title: "The Show Goes On, Even Without an Audience..."
passives.description: Decreases the number of enemies Sweeping Fervor must hit to trigger each level of shielding.
descriptions: Shield Level 2: Lead-In requirement reduced to 1 enemy hit.
Shield Level 3: Rave requirement reduced to 2 enemies hit or more.

passives.title: "...Now That’s Rock ’N’ Roll!"
passives.description: Characters shielded by Sweeping Fervor deal 15% increased Physical DMG.

constellations.title: Fatal Acceleration
constellations.description: Upon scoring a CRIT hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan’s Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s. Can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.title: Impromptu Opening
constellations.description: Riff Revolution Physical DMG has its Crit rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

constellations.title: Double Stop
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Sweeping Fervor by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Wildfire Rhythm
constellations.description: Sweeping Fervor’s swing DMG decrease opponents Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

constellations.title: Screamin’ for an Encore
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Riff Revolution by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Rockin’ in a Flaming World
constellations.description: Decrease the stamina consumption of Xinyan Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan Charged Attack gain an ATK bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

characters.name: Zhongli
characters.description: Um convidado misterioso da Funerária Wangsheng. Sabe de muita coisa.

abilities.description: Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, causing stone spears to fall along his path.
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Dominus Lapidis
skills.description: Every mountain, rock and inch of land is filled with the power of Geo, but those who can wield such powers freely are few and far between.

abilities.description: Commands the power of earth to create a Stone Stele.
Causes nearby Geo energy to explode, causing the following effects:
descriptions: If their maximum number hasn't been reached, creates a Stone Stele.
Creates a shield of jade. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Zhongli's Max HP.
Deals AoE Geo DMG.
If there are nearby targets with the Geo element, it will drain a large amount of Geo element from a maximum of 2 such targets. This effect does not cause DMG.

abilities.name: Stone Stele
abilities.description:
When created, deals AoE Geo DMG.
Additionally, it will intermittently resonate with other nearby Geo constructs, dealing Geo DMG to nearby opponents.
1The Stone Stele is considered a Geo construct that can both be climbed and used to block attacks.
Only one Stele created by Zhongli himself may initially exist at any one time

abilities.name: Jade Shield
abilities.description:
Possesses 150% DMG Absorption against all Elemental and Physical DMG.
Characters protected by the Jade Shield will decrease the Elemental RES and Physical RES of opponents in a small AoE by 20%. This effect cannot be stacked.

skills.title: Planet Befall
skills.description: Brings a falling meteor down to earth, dealing massive Geo DMG to opponents caught in its AoE and applying the Petrification status to them.

abilities.name: Petrification
abilities.description: Opponents affected by the Petrification status cannot move.

passives.title: Arcanum of Crystal
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ores used when crafting Polearm-type weapons.

passives.title: Resonant Waves
passives.description: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, it will Fortify:
descriptions: Fortified characters have 5% increased Shield Strength.
Can stack up to 5 times, and lasts until the Jade Shield disappears.

passives.title: Dominance of Earth
passives.description: Zhongli deals bonus DMG based on his Max HP:
descriptions: Normal Attack, Charged Attack, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 1.39% of Max HP.
Dominus Lapidis' Stone Stele, resonance, and hold DMG is increased by 1.9% of Max HP.
Planet Befall's DMG is increased by 33% of Max HP.

constellations.title: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
constellations.description: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by Dominus Lapidis that may exist simultaneously by 2.

constellations.title: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
constellations.description: Planet Befall grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

constellations.title: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Dominus Lapidis by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
constellations.description: Increases Planet Befall’s AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall’s Petrification effect by 2s.

constellations.title: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
constellations.description: Increase the Level of Planet Befall by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
constellations.description:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.
A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character’s Max HP.

weapons.name: Hunter’s Bow
weapons.description: A hunter’s music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.

weapons.name: Seasoned Hunter’s Bow
weapons.description: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer’s arm.

weapons.name: Ebony Bow
weapons.description: A longbow made of ebony wood with stiffer limbs than ordinary bows. It is also a far more powerful weapon.
weapons.refinement: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by {{0}}%

weapons.name: Messenger
weapons.description: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.
weapons.refinement: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional {{0}}% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Raven Bow
weapons.description: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow’s limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.
weapons.refinement: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by {{0}}%

weapons.name: Recurve Bow
weapons.description: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.
weapons.refinement: Defeating an opponent restores {{0}}% HP

weapons.name: Sharpshooter’s Oath
weapons.description: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.
weapons.refinement: Increases DMG against weak spots by {{0}}%

weapons.name: Slingshot
weapons.description: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.
weapons.refinement: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by {{0}}%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

weapons.name: The Stringless
weapons.description: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.
weapons.refinement: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {{0}}%.

weapons.name: Alley Hunter
weapons.description: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.
weapons.refinement: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by {{0}}% every second up to a max of {{1}}%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by {{2}}% per second until it reaches 0%.

weapons.refinement: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {{0}}% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.refinement: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {{0}}%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

weapons.name: Favonius Lance
weapons.description: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.
weapons.refinement: CRIT Hits have a {{0}}% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {{1}}s.

weapons.name: Royal Spear
weapons.description: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.
weapons.refinement: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {{0}}%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

weapons.name: Dragonspine Spear
weapons.description: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.
weapons.refinement: Hitting an enemy with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {{0}}% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing {{1}}% AoE ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s. Enemies affected by Cryo are dealt {{2}}% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Vortex Vanquisher
weapons.description: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.
weapons.refinement: Increases Shield Strength by {{0}}%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {{1}}% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
weapons.description: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.
weapons.refinement: On hit, increases ATK by {{0}}% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by {{1}}%.

weapons.name: Skyward Spine
weapons.description: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin’s firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.
weapons.refinement: Increases CRIT Rate by {{0}}% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on enemies have a 50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals {{1}}% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

weapons.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
weapons.description: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.
weapons.refinement: HP increased by {{0}}%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on {{1}}% of the wielder's Max HP.

weapons.name: Staff of Homa
weapons.description: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.
weapons.refinement: HP increased by {{0}}%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on {{1}}% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional {{2}}% of Max HP.

weapons.name: Windblume Ode
weapons.description: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.
weapons.refinement: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by {{0}}% for 6s.

weapons.name: Elegy for the End
weapons.description: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.
weapons.refinement: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by {{0}}. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by {{1}} and increases ATK by {{2}}%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

For each different element present in your own party, the wearer’s Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.
Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

Defeating an enemy has a 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.
Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.
Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members’ Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.
Energy Recharge +20%.
Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.
Electro DMG Bonus +15%.
Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

Anemo DMG Bonus +15%.
Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent’s Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.
Character Healing Effectiveness +15%.
Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.
Gain a 15% Geo DMG Bonus.

Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.
Increases Shield Strength by 35%.
While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.
Pyro DMG Bonus +15%.
Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.
Pyro RES increased by 40%.
Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro by 35%.
Physical DMG +25%.
After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.
Elemental Burst DMG +20%.
Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members’ ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.
If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.
Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.
Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow.
Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.
Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.
Affected by Electro for 40% less time.
Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.
Cryo DMG Bonus +15%.
When a character attacks an enemy affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the enemy is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.
Hydro DMG Bonus +15%.
After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.
Cryo DMG Bonus +15%.
Increases Superconduct DMG by 100%. Increases Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Burst increases Cryo DMG Bonus by 30% for 10s.
Affected by Anemo for 40% less time.

reactions.name: Crystalize
reactions.effect: Creates a crystal that will provide a shield when picked up.

reactions.name: Superconduct
reactions.effect: Deals AoE Cryo DMG and reduces the target's Physical RES by 50%.

reactions.name: Swirl
reactions.effect: Deals extra elemental damage and spreads the effect.

resonance.name: Enduring Rock
resonance.effect: Increases shield strength by 15%. Aditionally, characters protected by a shield will have the following special characterists: DMG dealt increased by 15%, dealing DMG to enemeies will decrease their Geo RES by 20% for 15s.

resonance.name: Fervent Flames
resonance.effect: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time. Increases ATK by 25%.

resonance.name: Soothing Waters
resonance.effect: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time. Increases incoming healing by 30%.

resonance.name: Impetuous Winds
resonance.effect: Decreases Stamina Consumption by 15%. Increases Movement SPD by 10%. Shortens Skill CD by 5%.

resonance.name: High Voltage
resonance.effect: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time. Superconduct, Overloaded, and Electro-Charged have a 100% chance to generate an Electro Elemental Particle (CD: 5s).

resonance.name: Shattering Ice
resonance.effect: Affected by Electro for 40% less time. Increases CRIT Rate against enemies that are Frozen or affected by Cryo by 15%.

resonance.name: Protective Canopy
resonance.effect: All Elemental RES by 15%. Physical RES + 15%
